Salva Sans by Font Bureau is close (hard to be sure given the small size of the sample image):

[http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/SalvoSans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822154352/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/SalvoSans/ "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/SalvoSans/")

Hurme Geometric Sans No.4 is another possibility"
